sentences.sContent: Paul visited the local bars more frequently than was decent for a senior lecturer.
sentences.sCn: 保罗过于频繁地光顾当地酒吧，不太合乎高级讲师的身份。

sentences.sContent: The chairman did the decent thing (= did what people thought he ought to ) and resigned.
sentences.sCn: 主席体面地辞去了职务。

sentences.sContent: Everyone said he was a decent sort of guy.
...But there is plenty of decent food in the grocery stores...
...And by then people were just happy to have a decent quantity of food in their kitchens...

exam.question: This movie is not __________ for children to see: it contains too much violence and too many love scenes.

answer.explain: 句意： 这部电影少儿不宜， 因为它里面有太多暴力和色情镜头。profound： 深刻的， 意义深远的； valid： 有效的， 正当的； upright： 正直的， 诚实的。

synos.tran: 正派的；得体的；相当好的

words.tran: 合适地；高雅地；正派地；亲切地
正派；体面；庄重；合乎礼仪；礼貌

trans.tranOther: acceptable to people in a particular situation
